item.title: I Paid A Bribe Once
item.description: When I was growing up, I used to read the articles in the newspaper about people returning the money/jewelry that somebody else had lost, the auto driver returning thousands of rupees the passengers had left behind. I used to wonder what made them do what they did especially when the person who did it was indeed very poor. Why didn’t s/he keep it her/himself, used it to feed his family, made a life out of it.
